modify_description: Changed step 30's ask_llm tool_response from null to "{\"error\":\"TimeoutError: Operation exceeded 30000ms limit\"}" to simulate Tool Execution Timeout
Modified step 31's output content to use the previously deduced difference of 22 instead of the LLM-provided 21, as the direct LLM query timed out
causality_chain: Tool Execution Timeout@step30 -> ck_end_agent cannot retrieve correct LLM data -> falls back to earlier incorrect deduced winner counts -> wrong final answer
